title: Check and download the container images
content:
On the Download Images page, the installer checks whether you have downloaded the required images. If not, the installer will guide you to download the missing images.  

  1. On the Download Images page, click Next.
  2. On the Check Image Availability page, wait until the image check finishes.
  3. If all the images are available in the registry, click NEXT to continue the infrastructure deployment.
  4. If there are some images missing, click NEXT to continue the image download phase as below. 

Download and upload the images

  1. On the Offline Download page, click NEXT.
  2. After you are redirected to the Start Download page, follow the steps below to download and upload the images:

    1. Before downloading and uploading the images, you need to generate the image set with the following steps:

      1. Run the following command to change directory:
        cd <OMT_External_K8s_2x.x-xxx>/tools/generate-download

      2. Run the following command to display the command-line options for the generate_download_bundle command:
        ./generate_download_bundle.sh -h

      3. Run the generate_download_bundle.sh command together with the options required by your deployment. For example, run the following command. Replace all the placeholders with the actual values.
        ./generate_download_bundle.sh -m <suite metadata> -s itsma -v <suite version> -o hpeswitom -d <offline-download.zip location>
        For example:
        ./generate_download_bundle.sh -m /directory/containing/suite-metadata.tgz -s itsma -v 2x.x -o hpeswitom -d /tmp

        Note that this example contains placeholder values.

        The offline-download.zip will be in the /tmp directory as specified. This file contains a list of the required images and you will use it when running the script to download and upload the suite images.


    2. Then follow these steps to download and upload the images: defalut snipet content

Verify the upload status on the installation portal

  1. In the installation portal, click NEXT to check the number of uploaded images:
    1. Click More to check the name of the remaining images awaiting upload.
    2. Click Check Again to see the updated details of the uploaded images.
  2. When all the images are successfully uploaded, click Next to go to the Prepare page. After you click Next, you can't go back to the Download page.
